document_data.mainbody:
Cecie was a member of the Dead Rats gang in Luskan in the late 15 century.
Cecie was the daughter of Gylan.
Around 1490 DR, Cecie had been poisoned by Bregan Daerthe and driven mad to the extent that Titus Minton asked the Champion of the Burning Dawn to put them out of their misery.
